PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06612020-09-20FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNorthwest Territories Act
SubjectGovernment of the Northwest Territories Borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2015-644 of May 28, 2015; and (b) setting the maximum amount of the aggregate of all borrowings at $1.8 billion for the Government of the Northwest Territories.
AttachmentsAttachment
